data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 2,749 believers in Ávila, Castilla y León, Spain a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ávila, Castilla y León, Spain
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Ávila, Castilla y León, Spain. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Ávila to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Ávila.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Moor people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 171,700 people living in the county of Ávila.
Spirit, help the fearful in Ávila, Castilla y León, Spain to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Ávila, Castilla y León, Spain to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.
